attributes.action: Bring down Diesel inline with Petrol.
attributes.background: Bring Down Diesels inline with Petrol. Absolutely ridiculous the difference is up to 30p per litre dearer.And Diesel vehicles are obviously a lot more fuel efficient.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about petrol prices are a matter for manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
